pageContent: Objective: To investigate the association of the risk of prostate cancer (PCa) with the polymorphism of the CYP2E1 gene, smoking and drinking, and to explore the joint role of genes and living habits in PCa pathogenesis.

metaData.source:
Pain, fatigue and depression symptom cluster in survivors of prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31980895/
